entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
